scripts.test:coverage:html: vitest run --coverage && echo 'HTML coverage report generated at: coverage/index.html'
scripts.test:coverage:open: npm run test:coverage && npm run coverage:show
scripts.test:coverage:verify: npm run test:coverage && npm run coverage:check
scripts.coverage:show: echo 'Coverage report generated at: file://'$(pwd)'/coverage/index.html' && if [ -n "$BROWSER" ]; then "$BROWSER" coverage/index.html; elif command -v xdg-open > /dev/null; then xdg-open coverage/index.html; elif command -v open > /dev/null; then open coverage/index.html; else echo 'Please open coverage/index.html in your browser'; fi
scripts.coverage:check: echo 'Checking coverage files...' && ls -la coverage/ && if [ -f 'coverage/lcov.info' ]; then echo '✅ LCOV file exists'; echo '📊 LCOV file size:' $(wc -l < coverage/lcov.info) 'lines'; else echo '❌ LCOV file missing'; exit 1; fi
scripts.check-duplication: npm run check-duplication:production && npm run check-duplication:tests
scripts.check-duplication:all: npm run check-duplication:production && echo '\n=== Testing duplication in test files ===' && npm run check-duplication:tests
